ShadowProfile.Condition: Data.HasCompletedQuest('The Emerald Dreamcatcher') == false or Data.HasCompletedQuest('A Troubling Breeze') == false

If.Condition: Data.HasActiveQuest('A Troubling Breeze') == false and Data.HasCompletedQuest('A Troubling Breeze') == false
Data.HasActiveQuest('The Emerald Dreamcatcher') == false and Data.HasCompletedQuest('The Emerald Dreamcatcher') == false
Data.PlayerClass() == WoWClass.Rogue or Data.PlayerClass() == WoWClass.Warrior or Data.PlayerClass() == WoWClass.Hunter or Data.PlayerClass() == WoWClass.Warlock
Data.PlayerClass() == WoWClass.Druid or Data.PlayerClass() == WoWClass.Hunter or Data.PlayerClass() == WoWClass.Warlock or Data.PlayerClass() == WoWClass.Paladin
Data.HasActiveQuest('Gnarlpine Corruption') == false and Data.HasCompletedQuest('A Troubling Breeze') == true and Data.HasCompletedQuest('Gnarlpine Corruption') == false

While.Condition: Data.HasActiveQuest('The Emerald Dreamcatcher') == true and Data.AllQuestObjectivesAreComplete('The Emerald Dreamcatcher') == false

If.Condition: Data.HasActiveQuest('The Relics of Wakening') == false and Data.HasCompletedQuest('The Relics of Wakening') == false and Data.HasCompletedQuest('Gnarlpine Corruption') == true
Data.HasActiveQuest('The Emerald Dreamcatcher') == true and Data.AllQuestObjectivesAreComplete('The Emerald Dreamcatcher') == true
Data.HasActiveQuest('Ferocitas the Dream Eater') == false and Data.HasCompletedQuest('Ferocitas the Dream Eater') == false
